thread.title: John A in Montana
thread.title_full: Backcountry Gear reviewed by John A in Montana

author: John A in Montana
title: John A in Montana
text: Outstanding ... Simply outstanding...!... The young lady that took my order and help get the correct color. went over board for me and made the whole Backcounrtry experience very pleasant....Could not be any happier.. Thanks... Once again ... Outstanding..!
